# discord_user (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Discord user.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Look up information about a Discord user
data "discord_user" "example" {
  id = "123456789012345678" # Replace with your user ID
}

output "username" {
  value = data.discord_user.example.username
}

output "is_bot" {
  value = data.discord_user.example.bot
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the user.

### Read-Only

- `accent_color` (Number) The user's banner color as an integer.
- `avatar` (String) The user's avatar hash.
- `banner` (String) The user's banner hash.
- `bot` (Boolean) Whether the user is a bot.
- `global_name` (String) The user's display name.
- `username` (String) The user's username.
